content: What's the best place to look programmatically to find the newest stable versions of rustup and rust? Tags on the github repos?

Not sure on rustup, but yes for Rust. We currently tag a bit before release post is out usually, but it should be about right.

If you're ok with some latency, https://static.rust-lang.org/manifests.txt updates weekly
(and may be useful to get a fuller listing)
I think another way is to parse https://static.rust-lang.org/dist/channel-rust-stable.toml
